title: GEOG0023 – Learning Diary
text:
Welcome
This is a Quarto book of learning diary of CASA0023 Remotely Sensing Cities and Environments.
To learn more about Quarto books visit https://quarto.org/docs/books.
For each week, there will be summary and application example, followed by a reflection, please enjoy.

title: 1  Introduction
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.

title: 1  Week 1
text:
##Summary of Lecture 1
There are different types of remote sensing, the differentiation of different types of remote sensing depends on the types of sensors.

Active Sensors: reflect light emitted from the sun
Passive Sensors:
